version_description: fix bugs

1. Alarm tone setting
2. Face alarm subscription by face database

3. One-tap arm/disarm of NVR

4. Speed dome wiper control on NVR

5. App build date display

6. Playback association on Door interface

7. UI optimization of channel details and device details

8. Memory play of the last-viewed channels

9. Alarm video linkage of the alarm hub

10. Added year selection on video playback

11. DS11 ringtone trial listening for 3 s and chime linkage UI optimization

12. Added motion detection area settings of DB11

13. Wired alarm control panels can be added

14. Cloud messages added abandoned object, missing object, scene changing, tripwire, intrusion, face alarm, IPC external alarm, and IPC offline alarm

New Function
1. Display the latest 6 search records
2. Alarm messages for access control devices
3. Wi-Fi test tool
4. Alarm messages for license plate recognition
5. Alarm messages and face images display of people having fever
6. Camera offline prompts
7. Sound and light arm/disarm by period
8. Format the device memory medium (hard disk, SD card)
9. Playing back recorded videos with clips
10. Optimizations for device sharing time consumption
11. Operation guidance animation
12. Interaction optimization for voice call
13. Added security login and compatibility mode

New Function
1. Display open source library information
2. Customize the account image
3. Customize the user name of the account
4.Clear the cache
5. Temperature measuring machine alarm
6.Support VTO device do not disturb mode

1. Display open source library information
2. Customized account profile image
3. Customized account username
4. Clear the cache
5. Alarm messages from access controller with temperature monitoring
6. One-tap arming and disarming settings for the alarm control panel
7. Protection zone expansion for the alarm control panel
8. Do not disturb mode for VTO
9. Enter live video from Home with animation
10. Audio adjustment on live video window

1. Period setting for floodlight to be normally on
2. PIP mode for video playback
3. Update privacy agreement (EU version)
4. All video clips can be displayed
5. Video messages for VTO
6. Do Not Disturb mode for VTO
7. Test tool for push notifications
8. Enable/Disable control for periodic arm/disarm
9. Recognition and display of max.8 expressions for face events
10. Display 8 consecutive days of alarm messages
11. Cloud update for VTO

1. Added alarm event subscription of access control devices
2. Updated the cloud platform
3. Added password reset function for bound devices

1.Message performance optimization
2.Fix bugs

1. Support device entrusting and cancel entrusting.
2. Support to push device entrusting notification
3. Supoort to configure entrusting permission and entrusting validity period.
Fix bug.

1. Support Thailand phone number registration.
2. Support parking and loitering alarm.
3. Support subscribing room numbers to receive calls from VTO devices.
4. Support fisheye dewarping mode.
5. Fixed bugs of playback progress bar.
6. Fixed some bugs.

4. Support fisheye dewarping mode.

1.Optimize experience of service upgrading

1. Add search function on help and feedback interface
2. Add dark mode
3. Optimize initiation failure interface
4. Video call device can be added and applied to villas
5. Add video and audio setting switch to DB11/L26/C26
6. Platform is connected to ARC3000H wireless alarm hub
7. Add platform registration and upgrade entry for European users
8. Add cloud messages: video tampering, intelligent motion detection (person or vehicle), intelligent analysis (tripwire, intrusion, scene changing), disk exception (no disk, full disk, disk fault at device level), and channel offline
9. Support configuration of app default interface
10. Claim unbinding
11. Support evaluation of exception handling
12. Support system message

1.Optimized P2P connection
2.Added global upgrade platform services

1.performance optimization
2.fix bug

1 Added source code stream proportional play switch, and guide prompt
2 The alarm subscription and message interface are optimized and unified, and cloud messages are accessed under the account: virtual focus, items left behind, and items disappeared
3 Added feedback to collect information such as app version, country, phone model, system, and account, so as to quickly locate problems
4 Added prompt for changing username of the entrusted device
5 Added text and optimized icon on the ARC3000H alarm hub interface

1.Displays call duration in VTO call history, including VTO answering and mobile phone answering.
2.Illuminator: Supports mode setting in local device.
3.Added sharing and entrusting entry for entrusting devices in batch. Select multiple devices, and then scan the QR code to entrust the devices to installer.
4.Receives entrusting messages.
5.Promotes DMSS advantages in guide page.
6.Added DMSS(DCloud) update prompt when you do not use the DMSS(DCloud) account.
7.Four types of permissions can be selected for sharing devices: video preview, video playback, alarm push, and device control.
8.Supports IPC external alarm message type while using account.

3.The Login/Register button is prompted when the account is not logged in or the device is not added to the Home interface.
